prompt:
Create 4 prompts for a cohesive, chronologically flowing birthday greeting card that tells a visual story (9:16 ratio):

ðŸŽ¨ CREATIVITY MANDATE: Be genuinely creative, unique, and innovative! Avoid generic or clichÃ© designs. Think outside the box, surprise with unexpected elements, use bold artistic choices, and create something truly memorable and special. Push creative boundaries while staying appropriate for the card type and tone.

Theme: "birthday card with dogs"
Style: âœ¨ Smart Style
Tone: ðŸ˜„ Funny - humorous and lighthearted
To: Jordan
From: Jasmine
Message: "Happy birthday, Jordan! I hope your day is as amazing as the moment a dog hears the word "walk." May your year be filled with less shedding and more treats!

All the best,
Jasmine"



CRITICAL: Create a cohesive visual narrative that flows chronologically through the card experience:
1. FRONT COVER: First impression - sets the scene/introduces the story
2. INTERIOR SPREAD: The heart of the experience - continuation and climax of the visual story
3. BACK COVER: Conclusion - peaceful resolution or complementary ending

Requirements:
- Flat 2D artwork for printing (not 3D card images)
- Full-bleed backgrounds extending to edges
- IMPORTANT: Keep text, faces, and key elements at least 10% away from top/bottom edges (small amount may be cropped in printing)
- Keep text/faces 0.5" from left/right edges for safe printing
- CONSISTENT visual elements throughout: same characters, color palette, lighting, art style
- Progressive visual storytelling from front â†’ interior â†’ back
- Put any text in quotes and make it clear/readable
- Each section should feel like part of the same artistic universe
- TONE: Ensure the visual mood and atmosphere matches the humorous and lighthearted tone throughout all sections
- INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY SAFETY: If the user mentions specific characters, brands, logos, or products, automatically replace them with original generic alternatives in your prompts. For example: replace specific character names with "cartoon mouse character" or "superhero character", replace brand names with "colorful cereal" or "sports car", etc. Create inspired-by designs that capture the essence without referencing any protected names or specific copyrighted elements. Never include actual brand names, character names, or trademarked terms in the image generation prompts
- CONTENT SAFETY: Ensure all prompts are family-friendly and appropriate for greeting cards. Avoid any content that could be flagged by safety systems including: violence, weapons, inappropriate imagery, political content, controversial topics, scary or disturbing elements, or anything not suitable for all ages. If the user requests something potentially inappropriate, redirect to positive, wholesome alternatives that capture their intent in a family-friendly way
- Include visual humor, playful elements, and whimsical details







Create prompts that flow chronologically:

1. Front Cover (Opening Scene): BE GENUINELY CREATIVE AND UNIQUE! Include "birthday" greeting text positioned safely in the center area (avoid top/bottom 10% of image). TEXT STYLE: Write the greeting text in beautiful, clearly readable handwritten cursive script that matches the elegant style used inside the card - legible, flowing, and graceful with natural character and warmth. Create charming cartoon-style or stylized illustrated figures if people are needed for the theme. This is the story opening - introduce key visual elements (colors, motifs, artistic style) that will continue throughout the other sections. Think of something unexpected, innovative, and memorable that will surprise and delight the recipient. Avoid generic designs! Style: in a whimsical and heartwarming watercolor illustration style. The scene features a delightful group of dogs of various breeds, all wearing charming, slightly-askew party hats. They are gathered around a picnic blanket in a sun-dappled meadow, with a simple, frosted birthday cake placed in the center. The colors are soft and luminous, with gentle washes of grassy greens, sky blues, and warm golden sunlight filtering through the trees. Each dog has a unique, joyful expression, captured with delicate ink lines that add character and personality. The entire image has a soft-focus, dreamy quality, with visible brushstrokes and paint bleeds that emphasize the handmade, heartfelt nature of the art, making it feel like a cherished memory painted with love.

2. Left Interior (Story Development): UNLEASH YOUR CREATIVITY! You have complete creative freedom to design whatever you want for this left interior page! This is your artistic playground - create something genuinely innovative and unexpected that feels right for a birthday card with humorous and lighthearted tone. You can include: scenes, landscapes, objects, patterns, quotes, text, illustrations, realistic art, abstract art, or anything else that inspires you - but NO PEOPLE or characters unless the user specifically mentioned wanting people in their card description. Position any text safely in center area (avoid top/bottom 10%). Think of something no one has done before! Surprise us with bold, imaginative, and memorable artistic choices while maintaining visual harmony with the overall card style and tone. Style: in a whimsical and heartwarming watercolor illustration style. The scene features a delightful group of dogs of various breeds, all wearing charming, slightly-askew party hats. They are gathered around a picnic blanket in a sun-dappled meadow, with a simple, frosted birthday cake placed in the center. The colors are soft and luminous, with gentle washes of grassy greens, sky blues, and warm golden sunlight filtering through the trees. Each dog has a unique, joyful expression, captured with delicate ink lines that add character and personality. The entire image has a soft-focus, dreamy quality, with visible brushstrokes and paint bleeds that emphasize the handmade, heartfelt nature of the art, making it feel like a cherished memory painted with love.

3. Right Interior (Story Climax): BE CREATIVE WITH MESSAGE DESIGN! Include message text: "Happy birthday, Jordan! I hope your day is as amazing as the moment a dog hears the word "walk." May your year be filled with less shedding and more treats!

All the best,
Jasmine" positioned safely in center area (avoid top/bottom 10% of image) integrated into beautiful, innovative decorative artwork. HANDWRITING STYLE: Write the message in beautiful, clearly readable handwritten cursive script that feels elegant and personal. The handwriting should be legible, flowing, and have natural character - not overly perfect but graceful and warm. Use a nice pen-style appearance with natural ink flow and slight variations in line weight. Think of sophisticated calligraphy that's still approachable and easy to read. Make the handwriting feel genuine and heartfelt. Think beyond typical florals and patterns - create something unexpected and artistic that perfectly frames the handwritten message - NO PEOPLE or characters. This should feel like the emotional peak of the card experience, harmonizing with the left interior as a cohesive spread. Avoid clichÃ© designs and create something genuinely special! Use the elegant cursive handwriting style described above. Style: in a whimsical and heartwarming watercolor illustration style. The scene features a delightful group of dogs of various breeds, all wearing charming, slightly-askew party hats. They are gathered around a picnic blanket in a sun-dappled meadow, with a simple, frosted birthday cake placed in the center. The colors are soft and luminous, with gentle washes of grassy greens, sky blues, and warm golden sunlight filtering through the trees. Each dog has a unique, joyful expression, captured with delicate ink lines that add character and personality. The entire image has a soft-focus, dreamy quality, with visible brushstrokes and paint bleeds that emphasize the handmade, heartfelt nature of the art, making it feel like a cherished memory painted with love.

4. Back Cover (Story Resolution): BE SUBTLY CREATIVE! Create a simple yet innovative decorative design that brings peaceful closure to the visual story. Reference subtle elements from the front cover but keep it minimal and serene - NO PEOPLE, just beautiful, unexpected artistic elements that go beyond typical patterns or florals. IMPORTANT: Leave the bottom-right corner area (approximately 1 inch square) completely clear and undecorated - this space is reserved for a QR code. Focus decorative elements toward the center and left side of the design. Think of something quietly beautiful and memorable that complements the overall design while being genuinely unique. This should feel like a peaceful, artistic ending that surprises with its subtle creativity. Style: in a whimsical and heartwarming watercolor illustration style. The scene features a delightful group of dogs of various breeds, all wearing charming, slightly-askew party hats. They are gathered around a picnic blanket in a sun-dappled meadow, with a simple, frosted birthday cake placed in the center. The colors are soft and luminous, with gentle washes of grassy greens, sky blues, and warm golden sunlight filtering through the trees. Each dog has a unique, joyful expression, captured with delicate ink lines that add character and personality. The entire image has a soft-focus, dreamy quality, with visible brushstrokes and paint bleeds that emphasize the handmade, heartfelt nature of the art, making it feel like a cherished memory painted with love.

VISUAL CONTINUITY CHECKLIST:
- Same color palette across all sections
- Consistent lighting/time of day
- Same artistic techniques and brushwork
- Recurring visual motifs or symbols (but make them unique and memorable!)
- Progressive emotional journey from introduction to resolution
- Front cover: stylized cartoon/illustrated characters if people are needed for the theme
- Left interior: CREATIVE FREEDOM but NO PEOPLE unless user specifically requested people in their description
- Right interior: focus on message space with innovative decorative elements (NO PEOPLE)
- Back cover: simple yet creative decorative design without text or people
- Use simplified, friendly, charming character design if including people (front cover only)
- CREATIVITY PRIORITY: Always choose the more innovative, surprising, and memorable option over generic designs

Return JSON:
{
  "frontCover": "detailed prompt with story opening elements",
  "backCover": "detailed prompt with story conclusion elements",
  "leftInterior": "detailed prompt with story development elements",
  "rightInterior": "detailed prompt with story climax elements"
}

IMPORTANT: Create a completely unique and different interpretation for this specific card variant. Use different creative approaches, color schemes, compositions, and artistic elements while maintaining the same core theme and requirements.

generatedPrompts.frontCover:
```json
{
  "frontCover": "Front cover of a greeting card in a flat, stylized illustration style with bold linework and a limited, vibrant color palette of teal, orange, and mustard yellow. The scene depicts a cartoon dog with floppy ears, a wagging tail, and a tongue sticking out, mid-jump with an expression of pure excitement. The dog is rendered in mustard yellow with black and orange accents. Above the dog, an orange speech bubble contains the word \"WALK?\" in bold black sans-serif lettering. The background is a solid teal, with a hint of an orange doorway on the right. On the left, a small potted plant with green leaves adds a touch of nature. A stylized rug with orange and yellow geometric patterns is on the teal floor, with the dog's paws just about to land on it. The text \"Happy Birthday\" is prominently displayed at the bottom in a flowing, cream-colored cursive font, with a slight shadow effect for depth. The overall mood is energetic, humorous, and cheerful.",
  "backCover": "Back cover of a greeting card in a flat, stylized illustration style consistent with the front, featuring a limited color palette of teal, orange, and mustard yellow. The design is minimalist and serene, focusing on subtle visual cues. On the left side, a few stylized green leaves are depicted emerging from a small terracotta pot, echoing the plant from the front cover. A few loose, playful lines in mustard yellow and teal emanate from the central area, suggesting movement or a gentle breeze. The colors are applied in flat blocks with subtle texture that mimics a screen-print or block-print aesthetic. The entire background is a solid teal. The bottom-right corner (approximately 1-inch square) is intentionally left clear and undecorated for a QR code. The overall mood is peaceful and subtly artistic, providing a gentle conclusion to the visual story.",
  "leftInterior": "Left interior of a greeting card in a flat, stylized illustration style with bold linework and a limited, vibrant color palette of teal, orange, and mustard yellow, consistent with the front cover. The scene features a variety of playful dog-related motifs arranged dynamically. Scattered across the teal background are stylized bone shapes in mustard yellow, small orange paw prints, and a repeating pattern of simple, circular orange dog toys. A few loose, energetic lines in teal and mustard yellow create a sense of playful movement. There are no characters or text on this panel. The overall mood is energetic and fun, reinforcing the lighthearted theme of the card.",
  "rightInterior": "Right interior of a greeting card in a flat, stylized illustration style with bold linework and a limited, vibrant color palette of teal, orange, and mustard yellow, consistent with the front and left interior. The central focus is the message \"Happy birthday, Jordan! I hope your day is as amazing as the moment a dog hears the word \"walk.\" May your year be filled with less shedding and more treats! All the best, Jasmine.\" The text is rendered in a beautiful, flowing, cream-colored cursive script, reminiscent of elegant handwriting. The message is artfully integrated into a dynamic composition featuring stylized elements. On the left, a few energetic orange and teal lines suggest motion, while on the right, a simplified doorway shape in mustard yellow frames the text. Scattered around the text are small, stylized dog-related icons: a mustard yellow bone, a teal paw print, and a small orange dog toy. The background is a solid teal. The text is positioned to be easily readable and aesthetically pleasing, with the decorative elements enhancing rather than overwhelming the message. The overall mood is warm, celebratory, and humorous."
}
```
generatedPrompts.backCover:
This image is not a greeting card. It depicts a minimalist landscape with a tennis ball.

To generate an image of a back cover for a greeting card with a dog theme, based on the provided context, here is a prompt:

Back cover design for a birthday greeting card with a humorous dog theme. The artwork is in a whimsical and heartwarming watercolor illustration style, featuring soft and luminous colors with gentle washes of grassy greens, sky blues, and warm golden sunlight. Subtle elements from the front cover are referenced minimally. The design is serene and quiet, focusing decorative elements toward the center and left side of the image. The bottom-right corner area, approximately 1 inch square, is left completely clear and undecorated, reserved for a QR code. The overall aesthetic is one of peaceful, artistic closure, with subtle creativity that complements the theme without being generic or clichÃ©.
generatedPrompts.leftInterior: Left interior page of a greeting card with a flat 2D cartoon illustration in a "Smart Style" with bold, graphic linework and a limited, vibrant color palette of teal, orange, yellow, and cream. The composition features three dogs of different breeds: a slender, orange greyhound-like dog on the left; a fluffy, yellow poodle on the upper right; and a stout, white and orange bulldog on the bottom. All dogs are on leashes that are comically tangled into a complex knot in the center of the image. The dogs have exaggerated, expressive eyes and open mouths, conveying surprise or mild distress, with small white dash marks near their heads to indicate their reactions. The background is a solid, deep teal. The style is clean, modern, and humorous, relying on strong shapes and poses to convey the narrative of the tangled leashes. The overall impression is playful and energetic, with a touch of absurdity fitting a humorous birthday card.
generatedPrompts.rightInterior: Right interior page of a birthday card designed for message space with a warm, playful aesthetic. The background is a solid, bright orange-yellow. The message text, "Happy birthday, Jordan! I hope your day is as amazing as the moment a dog hears the word 'walk.' May your year be filled with less shedding and more treats! All the best, Jasmine," is rendered in a dark brown, elegant, and readable cursive script. The typography is central to the design, with a natural, handwritten feel, including subtle variations in line weight that mimic ink flow. There are no decorative borders or frames; instead, the text is complemented by whimsical, flat 2D illustrations of dog-related items. In the upper left corner, a stylized hot dog is depicted. In the upper right and lower left corners, two colorful dog rope toys are shown, one a knotted loop and the other a braided knot with frayed ends. In the lower right corner, a simple, stylized dog bone is positioned. These playful elements are strategically placed to avoid overwhelming the message while enhancing the birthday card's theme and humorous tone. The overall style is clean and graphic, with a focus on bold shapes and clear readability, avoiding any complex textures or gradients.
